languages.text: {n}Пальцы Паскаля раздвигают края раны на груди. Кровь, перемешанная со священной смазкой, льется струйками по восковой коже. Удивительно, как много железа поместилось в его впалую грудь. Вы видите серую ткань легких, проткнутую десятками тонких трубок. Неизвестный вам орган из синтетических волокон, сжатый в решетке защитных ободов. Широкий кожух респираторной системы, ныряющий в дрожащую гортань. И все эти аугментации испещрены, словно ржавчиной, мелкими присадками ксенотеха.{/n}

{n}Pasqal's fingers widen the edges of the wound. Blood mixed with sacred unguents trickles down his wax-like skin. His sunken chest contains more metal than you thought possible. You see the grey tissue of his lungs pierced by dozens of thin tubes. An unfamiliar organ made of synthetic fibre, imprisoned in a cage of protective rings. The wide cover over his respiratory system that disappears into his trembling larynx. All these augmetics are riddled with small grafts of xenotech clinging to them like rust.{/n}

languages.text: {n}パスカルの指が傷口を広げる。蝋のような肌を、聖なる軟膏の混じった血が伝う。陥没した彼の胸には、あなたが思っていた以上の金属が収められていた。肺の灰色の布が何本もの細い管に貫かれているのが見える。合成繊維でできた見慣れぬ臓器が保護リングの檻に挟まれている。呼吸器系を覆う幅広のカバーは、震える喉頭の奥へ続いている。これらすべてのオーグメティックには、異星技術の小さな移植片が錆のように付着していた。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Pasqal's fingers widen the edges of the wound. Blood mixed with sacred unguents trickles down his wax-like skin. His sunken chest contains more metal than you thought possible. You see the grey tissue of his lungs pierced by dozens of thin tubes. An unfamiliar organ made of synthetic fibre, imprisoned in a cage of protective rings. The wide cover over his respiratory system that disappears into his trembling larynx. All these augmetics are riddled with small grafts of xenotech clinging to them like rust.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}パスカルの指が傷口を広げる。蝋のような肌を、聖なる軟膏の混じった血が伝う。陥没した彼の胸には、あなたが思っていた以上の金属が収められていた。肺の灰色の布が何本もの細い管に貫かれているのが見える。合成繊維でできた見慣れぬ臓器が保護リングの檻に挟まれている。呼吸器系を覆う幅広のカバーは、震える喉頭の奥へ続いている。これらすべてのオーグメティックには、異星技術の小さな移植片が錆のように付着していた。{/n}

languages.text: {n}帕斯卡用手指扯开了伤口，混合神圣机油的鲜血顺着他蜡样的皮肤流了下来。他敞开的胸腔里，金属器械比你想象的要多出很多。你看到他肺部的灰色组织上连着几十根细管，某种由陌生合成纤维制成的器官外面紧紧覆着一圈保护环。呼吸系统巨大的覆板连接在他颤抖的喉部。然而，所有植入物表面都布满了异形科技的小型增生物，仿佛铁锈一样粘在上面。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Pasqal's fingers widen the edges of the wound. Blood mixed with sacred unguents trickles down his wax-like skin. His sunken chest contains more metal than you thought possible. You see the grey tissue of his lungs pierced by dozens of thin tubes. An unfamiliar organ made of synthetic fibre, imprisoned in a cage of protective rings. The wide cover over his respiratory system that disappears into his trembling larynx. All these augmetics are riddled with small grafts of xenotech clinging to them like rust.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}帕斯卡用手指扯开了伤口，混合神圣机油的鲜血顺着他蜡样的皮肤流了下来。他敞开的胸腔里，金属器械比你想象的要多出很多。你看到他肺部的灰色结构上连着几十根细管，某种由陌生合成纤维制成的器官外面紧紧覆着一圈保护环。呼吸系统巨大的覆板连接在他颤抖的喉部。然而，所有植入物表面都布满了异形科技的小型增生物，仿佛铁锈一样粘在上面。{/n}

languages.text: {n}Los dedos de Pasqal agrandan los bordes de la herida. La sangre mezclada con ungüentos sagrados resbala por su piel de cera. Su pecho hundido contiene más metal del que parecería posible. Ves el tejido gris de sus pulmones perforado por docenas de finos tubos. Un órgano desconocido de fibra sintética, encerrado por una jaula de anillos protectores. La amplia cubierta sobre su sistema respiratorio que desaparece en su temblorosa laringe. Todos estos auméticos están plagados de pequeños injertos de xenotecnología que se aferran a ellos como el óxido.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Pasqal's fingers widen the edges of the wound. Blood mixed with sacred unguents trickles down his wax-like skin. His sunken chest contains more metal than you thought possible. You see the grey tissue of his lungs pierced by dozens of thin tubes. An unfamiliar organ made of synthetic fibre, imprisoned in a cage of protective rings. The wide cover over his respiratory system that disappears into his trembling larynx. All these augmetics are riddled with small grafts of xenotech clinging to them like rust.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Los dedos de Pasqal agrandan los bordes de la herida. La sangre mezclada con ungüentos sagrados resbala por su piel de cera. Su pecho hundido contiene más metal del que pensabas. Ves el tejido gris de sus pulmones perforado por docenas de finos tubos. Un órgano desconocido de fibra sintética, sujeto por una jaula de anillos protectores. La amplia cubierta sobre su sistema respiratorio que desaparece en su temblorosa laringe. Todos estos auméticos están plagados de pequeños injertos de xenotecnología que se aferran a ellos como el óxido.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Pasqals Finger weiten die Ränder der Wunde. Blut vermischt mit heiligen Salbölen rinnt seine wachsgleiche Haut hinunter. Seine eingefallene Brust enthält mehr Metall, als du für möglich gehalten hättest. Du siehst das graue Gewebe seiner Lungen, durchlöchert von Dutzenden von dünnen Röhrchen. Ein unbekanntes Organ aus synthetischen Fasern, in einen Käfig aus schützenden Ringen gefasst. Die breite Abdeckung über seinem Respirationssystem, das in seinem zitternden Kehlkopf verschwindet. All diese Augmentationen sind mit winzigen Transplantaten xenotechnischer Objekte übersät, die wie Rost an ihnen haften.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Pasqal's fingers widen the edges of the wound. Blood mixed with sacred unguents trickles down his wax-like skin. His sunken chest contains more metal than you thought possible. You see the grey tissue of his lungs pierced by dozens of thin tubes. An unfamiliar organ made of synthetic fibre, imprisoned in a cage of protective rings. The wide cover over his respiratory system that disappears into his trembling larynx. All these augmetics are riddled with small grafts of xenotech clinging to them like rust.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Pasqals Finger weiten die Ränder der Wunde. Blut vermischt mit heiligen Salbölen rinnt seine wachsgleiche Haut hinunter. Seine eingefallene Brust enthält mehr Metall, als du für möglich gehalten hättest. Du siehst das graue Gewebe seiner Lungen, durchlöchert von Dutzenden von dünnen Röhrchen. Ein unbekanntes Organ aus Synthetikfasern, in einen Käfig aus schützenden Ringen gefasst. Die breite Abdeckung über seinem Respirationssystem, das in seinem zitternden Kehlkopf verschwindet. All diese Augmentationen sind mit winzigen Transplantaten xenotechnischer Objekte übersät, die wie Rost daran kleben.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Pasqal élargit sa blessure, le sang mêlé aux onguents sacrés dégoulinant sur sa peau de cire. Sa poitrine contient bien plus de métal que vous ne l'auriez cru : le maillage gris qui compose ses poumons, transpercé de dizaines de tubes fins ; un organe étrange en fibre synthétique enserré dans une cage d'anneaux ; la structure de son système respiratoire qui disparaît dans son larynx tremblant. Tous ces augmétiques sont parasités par de petites greffes xénotechnologiques, qui s'y accrochent comme de la rouille.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Pasqal's fingers widen the edges of the wound. Blood mixed with sacred unguents trickles down his wax-like skin. His sunken chest contains more metal than you thought possible. You see the grey tissue of his lungs pierced by dozens of thin tubes. An unfamiliar organ made of synthetic fibre, imprisoned in a cage of protective rings. The wide cover over his respiratory system that disappears into his trembling larynx. All these augmetics are riddled with small grafts of xenotech clinging to them like rust.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Pasqal élargit sa blessure, le sang mêlé aux onguents sacrés dégoulinant sur sa peau de cire. Sa poitrine contient bien plus de métal que vous ne l'auriez cru : le maillage gris qui compose ses poumons, transpercé de dizaines de tubes fins ; un organe étrange en fibre synthétique protégé par une cage d'anneaux ; la structure de son système respiratoire qui disparaît dans son larynx tremblant. Tous ces augmétiques sont parasités par de petites greffes de xénotech, qui s'y accrochent comme de la rouille.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Pasqal'ın parmakları, yarayı uçlarından genişletiyor. Bal mumunu andıran cildinden kutsal özyağla karışık kan akıyor. Çökük göğsünde, ihtimal verdiğinden çok daha fazla metal var. Akciğerlerinin gri renkli dokularının onlarca ince tüple delindiğini görüyorsun. Sentetik liflerden yapılma olup tanıdık gelmeyen bir organ, koruyucu halkalardan oluşan bir kafese tıkılmış. Tir tir titreyen gırtlağına uzanıp gözden kaybolan solunum sisteminin üzerinde geniş bir örtü bulunuyor. Tüm ogmetiklerin üzeri; pas misali sıkıca yapışmış, ufak zeno teknolojisi parçalarıyla kaplanmış.{/n}
